info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 23 at 8:49PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 930 PM MST... At 849 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Freestone Park, or over Mesa, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mesa, Gilbert, Apache Junction, East Mesa, Freestone Park, Mesa Riverview Mall, Granite Reef Dam, Falcon Field Airport, Downtown Mesa, Usery Mountain Park, Superstition Springs Mall and Salt River Indian Community. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 179 and 201. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 170 and 188. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 12 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
